import { useState } from "react"; import data from "./Const/InfoPers"; import Email from "../Mail/smtp"; function Contact(){ const [Data,setData] = useState(data) function SendMail(text) { Email.send({ Host : "smtp.elasticemail.com", Username : data.Mail, Password : "password", To : 'them@website.com', From : "you@isp.com", Subject : "This is the subject", Body : "And this is the body" }).then( message => alert(message) ); } const contact =

Me contacter

Données personnelles

{Data.Nom} {Data.Prenom}

{Data.Mail}

{Data.Tel}

Envoyez un mail directement à mon adresse à partir d'ici !

return(contact) } export default Contact
